name: Ambassador
description: zferral is a custom incentive engine for businesses.  Our flexible and fully-integrated software gives you the tools to engage, mobilize and reward your fans.

apis.name: zferral
apis.description: zferral was designed to support all operations via an API. zferral offers web-hosted, custom affiliate and referral programs allows businesses to crowdsource sales and marketing. Users can create and manage custom affiliate and referral programs from a single dashboard. The API supports multiple methods of affiliate commission/event tracking.  The API uses RESTful calls and responses can be formatted in either XML or JSON.
